We have 238 country registered while there should be in fact 195 country, this proves that there are some errors in the data

```{r}
# Download libraries
library(dplyr)

covid_data_tibble <- tibble(contient=covid_data$continent, location=covid_data$location, population=covid_data$population, date=covid_data$date, new_deaths=covid_data$new_deaths)

# Get the distinct countries
distinct(covid_data_tibble, location)
```
